ygData.subject: Verant's stupidity rears it's ugly head..... POTTERY
ygData.msgSnippet: Well..... to all of you bitching about how people were making 40 plat an hour by selling pie-tins... Verant s last change has made it possible for some people
ygData.messageBody:
Well..... to all of you bitching about how people
were making 40 plat an hour by selling pie-tins...
Verant's last change has made it possible for some
people to make about 8,000 plat in 20 minutes. How?
Well.... those of us that used pottery often,
especially the evil races, kept sketches in the bank.
I, for one, had 8 back packs full of sketches plus a
back pack full on my character at the time I loggerd
out teh night before the day of the last update. I
figured i could at least use what sketches I had
saved up to make more pie-tins and thus a little more
money. well... I log in after the update.... the
sketches I have that used to be purchased for a
silver and some odd coin sells for about a plat or
so... no big deal. BUT, I can sell my SKETCHES back
to a VENDOR for about 5 gold eac.... they used to
sell for like 8 copper back to a vendor.

So... lets do some math here... thats 9 back
packs.... each back pack has 160 sketches in it...
and each sketch sells for 5 gopld each. Hmmm.....

I have heard of some people that thought ahead and
had multiple characters with inventories and banks
full of sketches that made ungodly sums of money
after the last update.

In effect.... Verant's attempt at fixing the game
economy has effectively destroyed it for some people.
But hey, I'm not bitchin'. At least I didn't have to
stand infront of a potttery wheel for hours on end to
make a lot of money.... and it didn't require me to
have any skill at all... hehe.
-Kenny
